directions: Mix red onion, jalapeno pepper, and lime juice in a bowl. Allow to stand for 5 minutes. Mix in Roma tomatoes, cilantro, and salt; allow to stand 15 more minutes for flavors to blend.
ingredients: 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped - or more to taste
2 1/2 cups Roma (plum) tomatoes, seeded and chopped
title: Ex-Girlfriend's Mom's Salsa Fresca (Pico de Gallo)
